bronze.title: Cameras Rolling
bronze.desc: Livestream for 12 hours straight with limited breaks.

bronze.title: Cooking Connoisseur
bronze.desc: Prepare a 5 course meal. Then share the recipe for all courses.

bronze.title: Yoga Yogi
bronze.desc: Stick to a yoga routine for 3 months. Show off your progress of the journey.

bronze.title: Michelin Chef
bronze.desc: Prepare any food that wins an award. Participation trophies do not count!

bronze.title: All Star
bronze.desc: Win a trophy or medal from a sporting tournament. Participation trophies do not count!

bronze.title: Wood Worker
bronze.desc: Construct something of wood. Furniture, decoration, or even a shed!

bronze.title: Can't Pause This Game
bronze.desc: Reach 1,000 hours of play-time in any video game.

bronze.title: Marathon's March
bronze.desc: Run or walk a half marathon, 13.2 miles. Must be an official race with number bibs!

bronze.title: East to West and Back Again
bronze.desc: Take a 2 week roadtrip. Don't stay in one place more than one night!

bronze.title: Land Owner
bronze.desc: Show off your slice of land! You must hold the deed to the property.

bronze.title: Game of Life
bronze.desc: Celebrate one year using ARL!

bronze.title: Hands of Bronze
bronze.desc: Complete a V7 bouldering challenge.

bronze.title: Cowboy
bronze.desc: Ride a horse!

bronze.title: Lost In Nature
bronze.desc: Spend two nights consecutively out in the wild. Alone or with others.

bronze.title: Of The Earth
bronze.desc: Grow your own food. Document its life from sprout -> harvest -> meal.

bronze.title: Bearing FAANGs
bronze.desc: Alone or with a group, publish an app for the iOS and Google Play store.

bronze.title: Civic Duty
bronze.desc: Decide who rules over you, it is your duty to democracy. Vote at a Federal, State, County, or Municipal election.

bronze.title: Artist's Hand
bronze.desc: Make a 6 piece series of art.

bronze.title: Family Feast
bronze.desc: Host a holiday dinner with at least 9 family members in attendance.

bronze.title: Well Educated
bronze.desc: Achieve your Highschool Diploma or GED.

bronze.title: Team ARL
bronze.desc: Contribute code that ends up being used in ARL. The app is open source! Github.com/SebTheRed/ARL

silver.title: Fleetfooted Fanatic
silver.desc: Complete 6 sanctioned races of the same sport. School-sanctioned races of any kind do not count.

silver.title: Mountain Climber
silver.desc: Successfully summit one of the 50 highest mountains in the world.

silver.title: Licensed Merchant
silver.desc: Found a government-recognized company by yourself or with partners.

silver.title: Code Crusader
silver.desc: Contribute 1,000 times in one year to Github. Share the projects you have coded for.

silver.title: Peer Reviewed
silver.desc: Publish a peer-reviewed study. Cite your sources!

silver.title: Silver Stage
silver.desc: Share your performance of any kind on a stage in front of an audience.

silver.title: Hard Work > Talent
silver.desc: Keep up with a goal you work on for an entire year. The goal can be anything, make your Mom proud!

silver.title: Año de Duolingo
silver.desc: Achieve a 365 day Duolingo streak.

silver.title: Social Butterfly
silver.desc: Take a selfie at 6 different social events where over 1,000 people are in attendance.

silver.title: History's Steward
silver.desc: Restore or help preserve a history landmark.

silver.title: A True Engineer
silver.desc: Build or majorly repair a motor vehicle. It must be operable upon completion.

silver.title: Ethlete
silver.desc: Achieve top-rank in any highly competitive video game. Like League, CS:GO, or Valorant.

silver.title: Patent Holder
silver.desc: Invent something unique and secure a patent for it.

silver.title: Solar Seeker
silver.desc: Transition your home to solar energy.

silver.title: ARL all Year
silver.desc: Reach a 365 day streak on ARL!

silver.title: Queen's Gambit
silver.desc: Compete in a regional or national chess tournament. School-sanctioned tournaments do not count.

silver.title: Family Reunion
silver.desc: Organize a family reunion with at least 25 family members.

silver.title: Committed Collector
silver.desc: Amass a collection of over 100 unique items of the same theme. Like stamps or Disney merchandise.

silver.title: Butchers & Shepherds
silver.desc: Construct & Share your own animal livestock collection.

silver.title: Of Good Will
silver.desc: Join the Peace Corps and serve one term.

silver.title: Home Sweet Home
silver.desc: Build or completely remodel your own home.

silver.title: Artisan Crafter
silver.desc: Create and sell over 100 hand-made items.

silver.title: Community Educator
silver.desc: Host your own classes (on anything) for 9 months, free of charge, at the local library.

silver.title: Indie Filmmaker
silver.desc: Produce and screen an independent film at a festival.

silver.title: Thrill Seeker
silver.desc: Complete an extreme sport challenge like skydiving, or free-soloing.

silver.title: Charity Champion
silver.desc: Raise over $1,000 for a charitable cause.

silver.title: Titleist
silver.desc: Place first place in tournament that has over 50 contestants. Alone or with a team.

silver.title: Call me Doctor
silver.desc: Achieve a PhD (or equivalent) in your field of study.

silver.title: Recipe Reach
silver.desc: Have one of your original recipes published in a printed cook-book or magazine.

silver.title: LAN-gendary
silver.desc: Host a LAN party with 9+ participants.

silver.title: Micro Brewer
silver.desc: Brew and brand your own line of craft beer, wine, or any alcohol.

silver.title: Angel Investor
silver.desc: Be the first to invest in a startup company and help it launch.

silver.title: Backyard Botanist
silver.desc: Cultivate a garden with at least 20 different plant species.

silver.title: HAL 9000
silver.desc: Convert your home into a smart home with technology you've programmed yourself.

silver.title: Triad Athlete
silver.desc: Complete a Triathlon.

silver.title: Food Truckin'
silver.desc: Sell food you cooked from a pop-up tent or food truck at a local festival.

silver.title: Full on Philanthropist
silver.desc: Found your own non-profit charity organization. Spread the word!

gold.title: Golden Devotion
gold.desc: Accomplish a 999 day streak on ARL.

gold.title: Life on the Silver Screen
gold.desc: Land a role in a broadcasted and/or streamed film or television show. Youtube does not count.

gold.title: Sisyphus' Prized Work
gold.desc: Master your specific field of Fitness. Something equivalent to a black belt, climbing Everest, or a cycling 100 miles in one day.

gold.title: Dreams do Come True
gold.desc: Register and open your own restaurant to the public.

gold.title: Public Servant
gold.desc: Serve as an elected official in a public office. Good luck on your campaign!

gold.title: Digital Dynasty
gold.desc: Gather 10,000 active users on an app/game/site that you own.

gold.title: World Record Holder
gold.desc: Have your name enshrined into the Guinness Book of World Records

gold.title: Globe Trotter
gold.desc: Visit 6 different countries, after joining ARL.

gold.title: One with Nature
gold.desc: Spend an entire week in the wilderness. Camping only in a tent, without re-entering society once.

call_loved_one.title: Call a Loved One
call_loved_one.desc: Place a phone call to a starred or favorited contact in your phone.

invite_family.title: Invite the Family
invite_family.desc: Tag a family member who you got to join ARL!

family_photo.title: Take a Family Photo
family_photo.desc: Take a picture with you & 2 other family members.

send_letter.title: Send a Letter
send_letter.desc: Send a letter to anyone! Receiving a letter must mean that they're family!

ancestral_home.title: Ancestral Roots
ancestral_home.desc: Explore and share a place where your ancestors once lived.

visit_relative.title: Visit a Relative
visit_relative.desc: Visit a family member who you don't live with.

cook_family_dinner.title: Cook a Family Dinner
cook_family_dinner.desc: Prepare a meal and enjoy it with your family.

elder_learning.title: Wisdom of Elders
elder_learning.desc: Spend a day learning a traditional skill from one of your elders. E.g. Woodworking, Knitting, etc.

organize_reunion.title: Family Reunion
organize_reunion.desc: Organize & attend a family reunion of at least 3 generations present.

help_with_chores.title: Chore Time
help_with_chores.desc: Help a family member with one of their chores.

family_movie_night.title: Family Movie Night
family_movie_night.desc: Watch a movie with your family.

family_game_night.title: Game Night!
family_game_night.desc: Attend a family game night with at least 4 members.

family_tradition.title: Family Traditions
family_tradition.desc: Help organize & partake in something you and your family would consider tradition.

family_heirloom.title: Family Heirloom
family_heirloom.desc: Document the story behind a family heirloom. When you're done, pass it down to the next generation.

weekly_family_meeting.title: Weekly Family Zoom
weekly_family_meeting.desc: Organize & attend a family zoom meeting.

house_project.title: House Project
house_project.desc: Design & document a large project that involves many members of your family.

property_upkeep.title: Property Upkeep
property_upkeep.desc: Work hard to upkeep or upgrade your property.

message_with_friends.title: Message with Friends
message_with_friends.desc: Log about a conversation you had with a friend today.

call_friend.title: Call a Friend
call_friend.desc: Log about a phone call you had with a friend today.

add_friend.title: ARL BFFs
add_friend.desc: Tag your newest ARL friend in a log post!

picture_with_friend.title: Take a Photo with a Friend

coffee_shop.title: Java Love
coffee_shop.desc: Spend time at any coffee shop, and take a picture of your order.

gaming_lounge.title: Gaming Lounge
gaming_lounge.desc: Have a game night with at least 3 other friends. IRL or virtual.

attend_club_meeting.title: Private Club
attend_club_meeting.desc: Check in at your club's meeting. IRL or virtual.

potluck.title: Potluck Dinner
potluck.desc: Organize or attend a potluck with your friends, where everyone brings a dish.

date_night.title: Date Night
date_night.desc: Take your significant other out for a night on the town.

restaurant_bar.title: Out on the Town
restaurant_bar.desc: Spend time at any restaurant / bar / brewery.

watch_party.title: Watch Party
watch_party.desc: Host an IRL or virtual watch party for a TV series finale, or big TV event.

festival_friends.title: Festival of Friends
festival_friends.desc: With friends, get out and experience a cultural or food festival in town!

movie_theater.title: Movie Night
movie_theater.desc: Spend some time watching a movie at a theater. Be sure to turn off your phone during the film!

attend_private_party.title: Private Party
attend_private_party.desc: Have a themed party of at least 4 friends.

book_swap.title: Book Swap
book_swap.desc: Trade a book you've already read with a friend doing the same.

class_together.title: Class of Clans
class_together.desc: Whether it's pottery, painting, or a new language, attend an IRL or virtual class with a friend.

surprise_party.title: Surprise Party
surprise_party.desc: Attend a surprise party for any celebration.

friends_road_trip.title: Road Trip!
friends_road_trip.desc: Take a roadtrip totaling 3 destinations with at least 1 friend or significant other.

company_time.title: Company Time
company_time.desc: Share a month's worth of work you put into your company. Feel free to shamelessly advertise, you earned it!

stretching_routine.title: Stretch it Out
stretching_routine.desc: Log that you've lovingly stretched all of your muscles.

walking.title: Go for a Walk
walking.desc: Go for a walk around town. Power-walking encouraged!

daily_aerobics.title: Daily Aerobics
daily_aerobics.desc: Get your blood pumping! Log about jumping rope, jumping jacks, or even dancing!

daily_pushups.title: Daily Pushups
daily_pushups.desc: Perform your daily pushups. Incrementing day by day encouraged!

cycling.title: Ride Your Bike!
cycling.desc: Ride it here, ride it there, ride it anywhere!

swimming.title: Amphibious Exercises
swimming.desc: Any workout in the water counts for this experience.

attend_gym.title: Go to the Gym
attend_gym.desc: Spend time at any gym. Use this as motivation.

rock_climbing.title: Rock Climbing
rock_climbing.desc: Climb some rocks, real or fake. Get those hands nice and chalky!

running.title: Runner's High
running.desc: Go for a run. Fun fact: humans can outrun almost any animal!

yoga.title: Namaste, Yogi
yoga.desc: Complete a yoga exercise, whether it be at home or at the studio.

snowy_fitness.title: Icy Veins
snowy_fitness.desc: Hit the slopes to ski or snowboard, doing tricks is encouraged!

attend_fitness_class.title: Fitness Class
attend_fitness_class.desc: Complete a fitness class that takes place outside of your home.

obstacle_race.title: No Easy Feat
obstacle_race.desc: Complete a race that involves obstacles. E.g. Mud runs, Spartan races, etc.

achieve_pr.title: Personal Record
achieve_pr.desc: Accomplish & document a person record of any category.

run_5k.title: Five Kilometers
run_5k.desc: Run 3.2 miles. Alone or in a 5k!

belt_rank.title: Martial Master
belt_rank.desc: Ascend in belt rank at an official martial arts academy.

class_instructor.title: Class In Session
class_instructor.desc: Lead a class of at least 8 students in an exercise of any kind.

yogis_choice.title: Yogi's Choice
yogis_choice.desc: Show off one unique Yoga pose you have never shared on ARL before.

finish_line.title: Finish Line
finish_line.desc: Compete in a race of any sport.

recycle.title: Reduce Reuse Recycle
recycle.desc: Do your part! Show off when you deposit a collection of recyclables.

plant_tree.title: Plant a Tree
plant_tree.desc: Plant a tree and log its species.

natures_lens.title: Nature's Lens
natures_lens.desc: Capture a breath-taking photograph of nature.

farmers_market.title: Fresh Food
farmers_market.desc: Purchase food from a farmer, or farmer's market, directly.

nature_hike.title: The Great Outdoors
nature_hike.desc: Hike/Bike/Climb/Be in any area considered nature.

water_garden.title: Water your Plants
water_garden.desc: Log that you watered your plants. Treat this as a reminder to do so!

camping.title: Camping Trip
camping.desc: Spend the night in any area considered nature. Glamping counts.

bird_watch.title: Bird Watching
bird_watch.desc: Snap a picture of a bird that you can see and identify it.

eco_home.title: Eco-Product
eco_home.desc: Switch to or showcase an eco-friendly household product.

home_garden.title: Home Garden
home_garden.desc: Take a picture of your home garden. It's that easy!

zero_waste.title: Zero-Waste Day
zero_waste.desc: Spend a day producing NO trash. Share your zero-waste techniques when you've finished!

upcycle.title: Upcycle a Recyclable
upcycle.desc: Instead of disposing of something, re-purpose it in your home.

clean_up_event.title: Community Cleanup
clean_up_event.desc: Clean up your community, with your community! 4 members are required.

compost.title: Composting
compost.desc: Log whether or not you've composted your food remains today.

outdoor_project.title: Outdoors Project
outdoor_project.desc: Imagine & create something outdoors. Let your imagination run wild!

animal_sanctuary.title: Animal Sanctuary
animal_sanctuary.desc: Spend time at an animal sanctuary and learn about wildlife conservation.

wildlife_park.title: National Parks
wildlife_park.desc: Spend time in any of this great nation's National Parks.

horse_riding.title: Horse Riding
horse_riding.desc: Spend time on the back of your horse.

mountain_madness.title: Mountain Madness
mountain_madness.desc: Climb or hike to the top of a mountain. Not a hill, a mountain.

sky_full_of_stars.title: Sky Full of Stars
sky_full_of_stars.desc: Spend the weekend camping with or without a tent, outside and with no modern amenities.

make_meal.title: Cook a Meal
make_meal.desc: Cook a meal & label what it is. Snacks do not count.

bake.title: Bake Something
bake.desc: Bake anything & label what it is.

grill_master.title: Grill Master
grill_master.desc: Cook an entire meal using only a grill.

bread_baker.title: Boulanger
bread_baker.desc: Bake your own bread from scratch. Share your process for others to learn!

meal_prep.title: Meal Prep
meal_prep.desc: Prepare meals for the upcoming week.

picnic.title: Have a Picnic
picnic.desc: Take time to enjoy your meal outdoors.

international_cuisine.title: International Cuisine
international_cuisine.desc: Cook a meal from a country/culture you've never cooked from before.

upload_recipe.title: Family Recipe
upload_recipe.desc: Document a unique recipe to share with others.

farm_to_table.title: Farm to Table
farm_to_table.desc: Make a meal using only locally sourced ingredients. One picture must include the vendor you bought from!

fermentation.title: Fermentation Station
fermentation.desc: Ferment something - could be sauerkraut, kombucha, kimchi, etc. Then share your process!

love_thy_neighbor.title: Love Thy Neighbor
love_thy_neighbor.desc: Cook or Bake food and give it to your neighbors. Save a little for yourself.

try_something_new.title: Changing Tastebuds
try_something_new.desc: Try any food you have never tasted before.

love_language.title: Universal Love Language
love_language.desc: Prepare a meal for someone else.

host_dinner.title: Host a Dinner Party
host_dinner.desc: Host a dinner party for yourself and 4 other family or friends!

whole_foods.title: Age with Grace
whole_foods.desc: Make a meal using only whole, unprocessed ingredients. This is the key to a long life.

holiday_feast.title: Holiday Feast
holiday_feast.desc: Document the cooking process of a holiday meal for you and others. Recipes encouraged!

preservation.title: Food Preservation
preservation.desc: Can, freeze, or dehydrate food for future use.

cooking_class.title: Cooking Class
cooking_class.desc: Host or attend an in-person cooking class.

earthly_ingredients.title: Earthly Ingredients
earthly_ingredients.desc: Cook a meal using at least one ingredient you have grown yourself.

github_commit.title: Git Commit
github_commit.desc: Log your newly commited code to a github repository.

retro_tech.title: Retro Tech
retro_tech.desc: Share a retro piece of technology you own or stumble across.

electricity_work.title: Electricity Work
electricity_work.desc: Work with live electricity in any capacity.

build_3d_model.title: 3D Model
build_3d_model.desc: Show off a 3D model you made.

commit_open_src.title: Open Source
commit_open_src.desc: Log your code commitment to an open-source github repository.

smart_home.title: Smart Home Integration
smart_home.desc: Share your newly installed piece of smart-home technology.

threeD_printing.title: 3D Print
threeD_printing.desc: 3D print something and show the world!

tech_documentary.title: Technology Documentary
tech_documentary.desc: Watch a documentary about any kind of technology and share your thoughts.

tech_tutorial.title: Tech Tutorial
tech_tutorial.desc: Create a tech tutorial and upload to Youtube.

raspberry_pi.title: Raspberry Pi
raspberry_pi.desc: Create/Add To/Modify a Raspberry Pi Project

build_app.title: Computer Application
build_app.desc: Develop a basic computer application in any programming language.

threeD_model_animation.title: 3D Animation
threeD_model_animation.desc: Animate a 3D model that you created.

robotics_project.title: Arigato Mr Roboto
robotics_project.desc: Build  and/or program a robot. Teams encouraged.

tech_expert.title: Tech Expert
tech_expert.desc: Repair a piece of technology instead of replacing it.

leetcode_challenge.title: LeetCode Challenge
leetcode_challenge.desc: Log about your algorithm that you wrote to solve a leetcode problem you haven't already completed.

attend_tech_conference.title: Tech Conference
attend_tech_conference.desc: Attend a tech conference of any kind. Must take picture of crowd.

full_stack_engineer.title: Full Stack
full_stack_engineer.desc: Work on the application you have published.

play_board_game.title: Tabletop Game
play_board_game.desc: Play a board or card game with at least 2 other people.

retro_gaming.title: Retro Gamer
retro_gaming.desc: Play a classic arcade style game. Bonus points if the game is in a cabinet!

playtime_hour.title: Video Game Playtime
playtime_hour.desc: Log about the video game(s) you've played today.

sports_practice.title: Practice?
sports_practice.desc: Train in anything that can be considered a physical sport.

party_games.title: Party Games
party_games.desc: Play a social party game, like charades, pictionary, or even Mario Party!

game_merch.title: Gaming/Sporting Merch
game_merch.desc: Share a piece of merchandise you own. E.g. a jersey, miniature, or even a signed ball!

puzzle_master.title: Puzzle Master
puzzle_master.desc: Complete a jigsaw puzzle with at least 500 pieces. Good company encouraged!

live_event.title: Live Sports Event
live_event.desc: Attend a sporting competition in real life. Must take picture of crowd.

sports_match.title: Sporting Match
sports_match.desc: Compete in anything that can be considered a physical sport.

fishing_trip.title: Fishing Trip
fishing_trip.desc: Even when you don't catch a thing, you can share your trip here.

escape_room.title: Escape Room
escape_room.desc: Successfully complete an IRL escape room challenge. Bring some friends, you'll need them!

game_achievement.title: Video Game Achievement
game_achievement.desc: Log about a video game achievement/trophy you unlocked today.

stream_time.title: Stream Time
stream_time.desc: Stream yourself gaming! Make the post before you begin to invite others!

sports_sim.title: Half & Half
sports_sim.desc: Play a match in any sports simulation game. Half sport, half video game!

tabletop_rpg.title: Play a TTRPG
tabletop_rpg.desc: Play a tabletop roleplaying game like D&D, either in person or online.

mmo_raid.title: Leeeeeroyyyy!
mmo_raid.desc: Successfully complete a major raid or dungeon in an MMO with your guild/team. Show off your loot!

gotta_go_fast.title: Gotta Go Fast
gotta_go_fast.desc: Complete a speed-run of any video game.

tournament.title: Tournament
tournament.desc: Host a gaming or sporting tournament of any kind with 8 participants.

full_completion.title: 100%'ing The Game
full_completion.desc: Achieve 100% of all achievements in any video game.

winners_circle.title: Winner's Circle
winners_circle.desc: Share your trophy/medal that you earned in a sporting contest of any kind.

daily_duolingo.title: Daily Duo Lesson
daily_duolingo.desc: Complete & log about your daily duolingo session. Sharing your streak is encouraged.

daily_reading.title: Daily Reading
daily_reading.desc: Read at least one time today.

journal.title: JRL
journal.desc: Use ARL as your 160 character daily journal. Switching the post to private is encouraged.

language_exchange.title: Language Exchange
language_exchange.desc: Attend and partake in a language exchange event.

poem.title: Wordsmith
poem.desc: Write a short poem, and share it with ARL.

converse_foreign_language.title: Foreign Language Conversation
converse_foreign_language.desc: Log about a conversation you had in your non-native language.

idiom.title: Words of Wisdom
idiom.desc: Share an idiom or life advice with ARL. Direct quotes strongly encouraged.

tutor.title: Language Mentorship
tutor.desc: Spend time with someone who does not speak your language well, and help teach them.

lecture_circuit.title: Attend a Lecture
lecture_circuit.desc: Attend a lecture or talk. Enter with an open mind, you will be surprised what you gain.

read_foreign_book.title: Read Foreign Book
read_foreign_book.desc: Log about a book you are reading that is written in your non-native language.

author.title: Author a Book
author.desc: Write and publish a book! Share your awesome accomplishment here.

travel_foreign_country.title: Travel to Foreign Country
travel_foreign_country.desc: Spread your wings! Share your travels with the world.

scholars_studies.title: Scholar's Studies
scholars_studies.desc: Share what you've studied in pursuit of an Associates, Bachelors, or higher level degree.

curriculum_contributor.title: Curriculum Contributor
curriculum_contributor.desc: Share the progress you have made on your research.

meditation.title: Meditation | Prayer
meditation.desc: Sit still and listen.. Focus on breathing or communing with the Divine.

create_art.title: Artist's Hand
create_art.desc: Create your own art and upload it here for the world to enjoy.

create_music.title: Making of the Music
create_music.desc: Play & upload music you have created for the world to hear.

pet_time.title: Human's Best Friend
pet_time.desc: Spend time with your pet. To you, they're only a part of your life. To them, you are everything!

donation.title: Second Handed
donation.desc: Donate clothing, homegoods, or foodstuffs to any charitable organization.

volunteer_event.title: Volunteering
volunteer_event.desc: Get out and give back to your community.

first_amendment.title: 1st Amendment
first_amendment.desc: Gather with a group of like-minded individuals and march for a cause you all believe in.

attend_live_show.title: Live Show
attend_live_show.desc: Attend a live show of any kind. Must take picture of crowd.

tutor.title: From one Mind to Another
tutor.desc: Share a skill or talent with someone who is eager to learn from you.

blood_drive.title: Blood Drive
blood_drive.desc: Give blood to a blood bank. Be sure to eat & stay hydrated!

visit_museum.title: Museum Day
visit_museum.desc: Visit a museum of any kind.

thrift.title: Thoroughly Thrify
thrift.desc: Share what you buy second-hand. Help reduce the carbon-footprint of consumerism.

attend_art_show.title: Art Show
attend_art_show.desc: Attend an art show, and see if any art is worth your dollar.

historic_site.title: History Happened Here
historic_site.desc: Travel to a historic location. Be sure to absorb the history and significance of the place.

maestro.title: Artistic Instructor
maestro.desc: Lead a class of at least 8 students in any form of artistic or spiritual instruction.

organize_charity.title: Philanthropy in Arms
organize_charity.desc: Organize and accomplish charity work with 4+ people including yourself.

present_talent.title: Present Your Talent
present_talent.desc: Share your art at shows, publish your music online, etc. Any real life showing of your art counts!

go_vote.title: Go Vote
go_vote.desc: Vote in a Municipal, County, State, or Federal election.

break_a_leg.title: Break A Leg!
break_a_leg.desc: Get up on stage and put on a show for the audience!
